Package oop2.jeopardy.report

Class DocxReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
oop2.jeopardy.report.DocxReportGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportGenerator
public class DocxReportGenerator extends Object implements ReportGenerator
Generates reports in DOCX format.

      Generates a DOCX report summarizing the provided GameHistory.
      Specified by:
      generate in interface ReportGenerator
      Parameters:
      history - the game history to summarize
      filename - the output file path (or resource name)
      Throws:
      Exception - if an I/O or document generation error occurs
